Articles.Content:
This is a test flight for a proof of concept design I have for sending a SSTO spaceplane to Laythe and back while allowing the Kerbalnauts

spacious crew quarters during their long voyage. Two craft are required. The carrier craft launches from the VAB Launch Pad into a LKO while

the spaceplane launches from the runway. Once both ships are in orbit the spaceplane will rendezvous and dock with the carrier.

The carrier was the hardest to get the balance right since it's not meant to fly for long distances on it's own without the spaceplane docked.

The spaceplane's cargo bay can be setup for different situations. A science bay, a satellite/probe bay, or hauling supply crates.

I hope you will enjoy!

Edited December 28, 2014 by Landge
